instructions.title: How To Deactivate Your Duolingo Account
instructions.before:
You have two options for disabling your account.  You can either deactivate your account, which gives you the option to return at a later date, or you can permanently delete your account and erase all of your personal data.  However, you cannot complete any of these through a mobile device, you must log on from your desktop browser. 

To deactivate your account follow the steps below.
instructions.after: Remember, when you decide that you want your account back all you have to do is re-login with the same email address you originally used to sign up for your account.

qnAnswers.question: What is the difference between Deactivating my Account and Deleting my Account?
qnAnswers.answer: If you deactivate your account you have the option of restoring your account just by logging in, plus your username is saved and cannot be used by anyone else. If you delete your account you lose all of your information and it can never be restored. You will have a 7-day grace period after you request deletion in case you change your mind. However, once you complete deletion to your account this action cannot be undone.

qnAnswers.question: How do I restore my information after account deactivation?
qnAnswers.answer: You will be able to re-activate your information to your account just by logging back in.

qnAnswers.question: What happens to my information after I Deactivate my Account?
qnAnswers.answer: If you deactivate your account, your username and email associated with your account will be reserved so that nobody else can sign up with those. Any messages in the forum posted by you under this account will appear as [deactivated user] unless you re-activate the account.

qnAnswers.question: Will Deactivating my Account cancel my Duolingo Plus subscription?
qnAnswers.answer: The quick answer is No.  it is important to note that if you are a Duolingo Plus subscriber via the mobile apps, disabling your account will not suspend charges, those are done by Apple or Google. Therefore, you would need to cancel through Apple or Google.
